Package com.atakmap.android.maps

Class AtakGlobeEventService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.AtakGlobeEventService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGlobeEventService, IGlobeEventService2
    public class AtakGlobeEventService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGlobeEventService2
    ATAK implementation of the IGlobeEventService Unified API. This is implemented with with MapEventDispatcher so the listener stack is fully integrated.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  AtakGlobeEventService.InverseImpl
      Implementation to use when translating from view points to globe coordinates

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gov.tak.api.events.IGlobeEventService

      • pushGlobeEventListeners

        public void pushGlobeEventListeners()
        Description copied from interface: IGlobeEventService
        Push a new set of listeners on the stack. Subsequent calls to addGlobeEventListener() and removeGlobeEventListener() will affect the newly pushed set.
        Specified by:
        pushGlobeEventListeners in interface IGlobeEventService

      • popGlobeEventListeners

        public void popGlobeEventListeners()
        Description copied from interface: IGlobeEventService
        Pop the current set of listeners off the stack. Subsequent call to addGlobeEventListener() and removeGlobeEventListener() will affect the restored set at the top of the stack.
        Specified by:
        popGlobeEventListeners in interface IGlobeEventService

      • addEventSource

        public void addEventSource​(@NonNull
                           java.lang.Object source,
                           @NonNull
                           IGlobe globe,
                           @NonNull
                           MapEventDispatcher mapEventDispatcher,
                           @NonNull
                           AtakGlobeEventService.InverseImpl inverseImpl)
        Add an event source to the implementation.
        Parameters:
        source - the instance provided for the IGlobeEvent.getSource() call
        globe - the IGlobe instance for the main event target and globe id
        mapEventDispatcher - the event dispatcher that triggers the globe events
        inverseImpl - the view point to globe coordinate implementation

      • removeEventSource

        public void removeEventSource​(java.lang.Object source)
        Remove an event source
        Parameters:
        source - the same event source instance passed to addEventSource
